meanings.definition: Pertaining to or marking a period of 300 years.
meanings.sent1: The tercentenary event was a grand celebration of our town's history.
meanings.sent2: The tercentenary exhibition showcased artifacts from the past three centuries.
meanings.sent3: The tercentenary decorations made the whole place look like a time machine!
meanings.sent4: The tercentenary atmosphere filled the room with a sense of nostalgia and pride.
meanings.sent5: The tercentenary banner fluttered in the wind, symbolizing our long history.

meanings.sent1: The town prepared for the tercentenary with parades and fireworks.
meanings.sent2: Everyone gathered at the park to celebrate the tercentenary of the school.
meanings.sent3: The tercentenary cake was so big, it took three people to carry it!
meanings.sent4: The tercentenary party was a blast, with music and laughter filling the air.
meanings.sent5: The tercentenary ceremony honored the founders who established the community 300 years ago.
